definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: It is usually a semicircular wheaten food with stuffing.
sentences.chinese: 它通常是有餡的半圓形的麥制食品。

sentences.english: The Japan Pavilion is a semi-circular structure, covered by a purple membrane material.
sentences.chinese: 日本館呈半圓形，採用紫色薄膜材料包裹。

sentences.english: Semi-circular concrete members are a new type of structural members used for harbour engineering.
sentences.chinese: 半圓形構件是港口工程中新型構件。

sentences.english: Ear is a semicircle, nose is black, short tail, very lovely.
sentences.chinese: 耳朵是半圓形，鼻子是黑色，尾巴短短的，很可愛。

sentences.english: Trigonal tongue cover, generous sculpt, easy to open.
sentences.chinese: 半圓形舌蓋，造型大方，方便開啓。

sentences.english: Copper chuck using a semicircle shape or platform and easy installation fixture.
sentences.chinese: 銅夾頭採用半圓形或平臺形，方便安裝工裝夾具。

sentences.english: The building is fronted by semi-circular balconies with perforated metal balustrades.
sentences.chinese: 建築的前面是帶有穿孔金屬欄杆的半圓形陽臺。

sentences.english: Semicircular tongue cover , generous modeling, convenient to open.
sentences.chinese: 半圓形舌蓋，造型大方，方便出啓。

sentences.english: Line up drum moulds in a semi circle at one end of the bath.
sentences.chinese: 把數個圓筒模子沿鋅鍋的一端排成一個半圓形。

sentences.english: The author has succeeded in performing this type of operation utilizing a semispherieal skin hook with a small round hole at …
sentences.chinese: 筆者採用半圓形皮鉤並鑽圓孔獲得較好的效果。

sentences.english: Claw on one side, showing triangular-shaped semi-circular keel.
sentences.chinese: 一側有爪，呈龍骨瓣三角狀半圓形。

sentences.english: But when the sun, the South there is a semicircle .
sentences.chinese: 可是豔陽的時候，南方出現了一個半圓形。

sentences.english: The village was formed of semicircle huts.
sentences.chinese: 這個村莊是由半圓形的茅舍構成的。

sentences.english: The author has succeeded in performing this type of operation utilizing a semispherieal skin hook with a small round hole at the en…
sentences.chinese: 筆者採用半圓形皮鉤並鑽圓孔獲得較好的效果。

sentences.english: The memorial has a large wall that is shaped in a half-circle.
sentences.chinese: 紀念館有一個半圓形的巨大牆壁。
